title: $:/plugins/OokTech/Directory
author: OokTech
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "Directory": { "title": "Directory", "text": "\define thisWebsiteTitleFilter() [all[tiddlers+shadows]tagtag[]name_plate_type[TiddlyWiki]tag[Website]sort[title]regexp[(?i)$(TitleSearch)$]regexp:description[(?i)$(DescriptionSearch)$]] \end \define thisPluginTitleFilter() [all[tiddlers+shadows]tagtag[]name_plate_type[TiddlyWiki]tag[Plugin]sort[title]regexp:title[(?i)$(TitleSearch)$]regexp:description[(?i)$(DescriptionSearch)$]] \end \define thisEditionTitleFilter() [all[tiddlers+shadows]tagtag[]name_plate_type[TiddlyWiki]tag[Edition]sort[title]regexp:title[(?i)$(TitleSearch)$]regexp:description[(?i)$(DescriptionSearch)$]] \end <$checkbox tiddler='$:/temp/Directory/search' field='show_website' checked='true' unchecked='false' default='true' > Show Websites <$checkbox tiddler='$:/temp/Directory/search' field='show_plugins' checked='true' unchecked='false' default='true' > Show Plugins <$checkbox tiddler='$:/temp/Directory/search' field='show_macros' checked='true' unchecked='false' default='true' > Show Macros <$checkbox tiddler='$:/temp/Directory/search' field='show_editions' checked='true' unchecked='false' default='true' > Show Editions Title Search: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Directory/search' field=title_search placeholder='Title Search' class='tc-edit-texteditor' /> Description Search: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Directory/search' field=description placeholder='Description Search' class='tc-edit-texteditor' /> <$vars TitleSearch={{$:/temp/Directory/search!!title_search}} DescriptionSearch={{$:/temp/Directory/search!!description}} CurrentPerson="""OokTech""" > <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/temp/Directory/search!!show_editions' text='false' > __Editions__ <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$list filter=<> template=SiteNamePlateDisplayTemplate >
Name Version Date (dd-mm-yyyy) Description
<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/temp/Directory/search!!show_website' text='false' > __Websites (demos and reference)__ <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$list filter=<> template=SiteNamePlateDisplayTemplate >
Site Name Version Date (dd-mm-yyyy) Description
<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/temp/Directory/search!!show_plugins' text='false' > __Plugins__ <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$list filter=<> template=SiteNamePlateDisplayTemplate >
Plugin Name Version Date (dd-mm-yyyy) Description
<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/temp/Directory/search!!show_macros' text='false' > __Macros__ <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$list filter='[tagtag[]name_plate_type[TiddlyWiki]tag[Macro]sort[title]]' template=SiteNamePlateDisplayTemplate >
Macro Name Version Date (dd-mm-yyyy) Description
" }, "$:/plugins/OokTech/Directory/Acknowledgements": { "title": "$:/plugins/OokTech/Directory/Acknowledgements", "text": " This plugin was created and is maintained by [[OokTech|$:/plugins/OokTech/OokTechInfo]]. [[Tiddlywiki|http://TiddlyWiki.com]] was originally created by [[Jeremy Ruston|https://github.com/Jermolene/TiddlyWiki5]]. For general ~TiddlyWiki help see [[tiddlywiki.com|http://tiddlywiki.com]] or the [[google group|https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/tiddlywiki]]. Thank you to the general TiddlyWiki community for developing and maintaining the tiddlywiki core. " }, "$:/plugins/OokTech/Directory/License": { "title": "$:/plugins/OokTech/Directory/License", "text": "BSD 3-Clause License Copyright (c) 2017, OokTech LLC All rights reserved. Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are met: * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer. * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution. * Neither the name of the copyright holder nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from this software without specific prior written permission. THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE. " }, "$:/plugins/OokTech/OokTechInfo": { "title": "$:/plugins/OokTech/OokTechInfo", "text": "~OokTech is a small engineering company based in the USA with an international presence. We work on open software and hardware projects. Website: http://Ooktech.com
~GitHub: [[OokTech GitHub|https://github.com/OokTech]] " }, "$:/pluginlibrary/OokTech/OokTechPlugins": { "title": "$:/pluginlibrary/OokTech/OokTechPlugins", "tags": "$:/tags/PluginLibrary", "url": "https://ooktech.com/TiddlyWiki/PluginLibrary", "text": "The plugin library for plugins developed and maintained by OokTech. See http://OokTech.com/TiddlyWiki for more information. " }, "SiteNamePlateDisplayTemplate": { "tags": "Templates", "title": "SiteNamePlateDisplayTemplate", "text": " <$view field='caption' > <$view field='title' /> <$view field='revision' /> <$view field='date' /> <$view field='description' /> " }, "$:/plugins/OokTech/Bookmarks/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/OokTech/Bookmarks/readme", "text": "License: [[BSD 3 Clause|$:/plugins/OokTech/CategoryLists/License]] Creator: [[OokTech|$:/plugins/OokTech/OokTechInfo]] Source: [[GitHub|https://https://github.com/OokTech/TW5-CategoryLists]] " } } }
name: Directory
